attributes.action: Ban the import of products made from dog and cat fur
attributes.additional_details:
All products made from dog and cat fur to be banned from import to the UK. All fur products to be clearly labelled with animal breed, country of origin.  Any country breaching these requirements by mis-labelling products either deliberately or accidentally to have trade with them for such products terminated.

Full implementation of (EC) No 1523/2007 with immediate effect.
